conversations.dialogue: Hello Ettore, how fares the battlefield today?
I'm in my element, Hadley, ever ready for the clash of steel and valor. And you, amidst the serene bloom of nature's grace?
In the embrace of enchantment, my friend. The world is painted with the colors of harmony.
Hi Ettore, Can you show me how to do a Backflip?
Of course, my friend. Here, let me show you.
Hi Hadley, Can you show me your favorite spell?
With great pleasure, my friend. Behold, the power of Floromagia Elysium!
Ettore, can you show me some of your fight moves?
Of course, my friend. Here, let me show you.
Hadley can you show me another spell?
With great pleasure, my friend. Behold, the power of Musica Harmoniosa Creatus!
